mapper.sql: order_id, order_no, type, push_driver_type, order_type, booking_user_id, booking_date, rider_name, rider_phone, booking_start_addr, booking_start_point, booking_end_addr, booking_end_point, fact_start_addr, fact_start_point, fact_end_addr, fact_end_point, city_id, service_type_id, car_group_id, driver_id, license_plates, airline_no, airline_status, airline_plan_date, airline_arr_date, airline_dep_code, airline_arr_code, channels_num, receive_SMS, estimated_Amount, airport_id, status, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, fact_date, booking_groupids, fact_driver_id, fact_end_date, imei, version, mobel_version, sys_version, platform, pay_flag, cancelorder_penalty, chartered_id, chartered_order_no, is_order_others, doorman_pay_method, selected_pay_flag, business_id, go_home_status, auto_level_up, booking_driver_id, is_other_drivers, booking_current_addr, booking_current_point, booking_user_phone, buyout_flag, buyout_price, booking_id_number, estimated_id, agent_id
mapper.select: SELECT order_id FROM car_fact_order WHERE order_no = #{orderno}

SELECT a.order_no, IFNULL(a.channels_num,0)as channelsNum, a.pay_flag , a.rider_name , a.rider_phone , c.service_name, a.city_id, d.city_name , a.booking_start_addr , a.push_driver_type, a.booking_end_addr , a.booking_start_point, a.booking_end_point, a.fact_start_addr , a.fact_end_addr, a.fact_date, a.fact_end_date, a.booking_groupids, n.`name` AS bookingname, n.phone AS bookingphone, e.`name` AS drivername, e.phone AS driverphone, k.model_detail, DATE_FORMAT(a.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS createdate, DATE_FORMAT(a.booking_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T')as bookingDateStr, DATE_FORMAT(a.fact_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T')as factDateStr, e.name , a.license_plates , f.group_name bookingGroupName, m.group_name factGroupName, b.travel_time , b.travel_mileage , b.night_distance_num, b.night_distance_price, b.long_distance_price, b.reduction_totalprice, b.detail_id, IFNULL(b.actual_pay_amount,0) as actualPayAmount, IFNULL(b.hot_duration_fees,0) as hotDurationFees, IFNULL(b.hot_duration,0) as hotDuration, IFNULL(b.hot_mileage,0) as hotMileage, IFNULL(b.hot_mileage_fees,0) as hotMileageFees, IFNULL(b.nighit_duration,0) as nighitDuration, IFNULL(b.nighit_duration_fees,0) as nighitDurationFees, IFNULL(b.driver_pay,0) as paydriver, IFNULL(b.decimals_fees,0) as decimalsFees, IFNULL(paymentcustomer.amount,0) AS paymentCustomer, IFNULL(paymentdriver.amount,0) AS paymentDriver, a.memo , h.base_price , b.total_amount , b.over_mileage_price , b.over_time_price , a.status, a.booking_user_id, a.service_type_id, a.airline_no, a.driver_id, e1.`name` fact_driver, e1.phone driverphone, b.over_mileage_num , b.over_time_num, b.long_distance_num, b.out_service_mileage, b.out_service_price, b.night_service_mileage, b.night_service_price, b.forecast_amount, x.`NAME` AS yyperson, SUM(cbca.amount) AS customeramount, DATE_FORMAT(x.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T')as yydate, x.memo as yymemo, x.`status` AS yystatus, y.memo AS qxmemo, y.`NAME` AS qxperson, DATE_FORMAT(y.create_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS qxdate, y.cancel_type AS qxreasonname, y.cancel_status as qxcancelstatus, z.`name` AS jmname, DATE_FORMAT(z.reduction_date,'%Y-%m-%d %T')as jmdate, z.reduction_price as jmprice, z.reduction_reason AS jmreason, IFNULL(de.wx_settle_amount, 0) AS weixin, IFNULL(de.zfb_settle_amount, 0) AS zfb, IFNULL(de.passenger_pending_pay, 0) AS passengerPendingPay, de.settle_date settleDate, de.pay_type payType,
det.customer_reject_pay,
IFNULL(b.designated_driver_fee, 0) as designatedDriverFee,
IFNULL(b.waiting_minutes, 0) as waitingTime,
IFNULL(b.waiting_fee, 0) as waitingPrice,
partner.pay_amount as baiDuOrCtripPrice, IFNULL(deo.language_service_fee, 0) as languageServiceFee, deo.distant_detail distantDetail, deo.channel_discount_driver channelDiscountDriver, a.airport_id from car_fact_order a LEFT JOIN car_biz_order_cost_detail_extension deo ON deo.order_id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_order_cost_detail b on a.order_id=b.order_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_service c on a.service_type_id=c.service_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_city d on a.city_id=d.city_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_driver_info e on a.driver_id=e.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_car_group f on a.car_group_id=f.group_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_pricing h on h.price_id=b.price_plan_id and b.price_plan_version=h.version
LEFT JOIN car_biz_car_info k ON e.license_plates=k.license_plates LEFT JOIN car_biz_driver_info e1 on a.fact_driver_id=e1.driver_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_car_group m on e1.group_id=m.group_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_customer n ON n.customer_id=a.booking_user_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_partner_pay_detail partner ON partner.order_no=a.order_no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.memo, c.create_by, c.create_date, c.order_id, c.status, a.`name` AS NAME FROM car_biz_order_dissent AS c LEFT JOIN car_sys_user AS a ON a.user_id = c.create_by where c.order_id=#{orderId , jdbcType=BIGINT} ) x ON x.order_id = a.order_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT c.memo, c.create_by, c.create_date, c.order_id, a.`name` AS NAME, c.cancel_type, c.cancel_status FROM car_biz_order_cancel_reason AS c LEFT JOIN car_sys_user AS a ON a.user_id = c.create_by where c.order_id=#{orderId , jdbcType=BIGINT} ) y ON y.order_id=a.order_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.`name`AS name, c.reduction_date, c.reduction_price, c.reduction_reason, c.order_id FROM car_biz_order_cost_detail AS c LEFT JOIN car_sys_user AS a ON a.user_id =c.reduction_person where c.order_id=#{orderId , jdbcType=BIGINT} ) z ON z.order_id=a.order_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_wxpay_payrecord wi on a.order_no=wi.order_no AND wi.pay_order_flag=1 LEFT JOIN car_biz_ailipay_payrecord al ON a.order_no=al.order_no AND al.pay_order_flag=1 LEFT JOIN car_biz_customer_account_detail cbca ON a.order_no=cbca.order_no AND cbca.operation=3 LEFT JOIN car_biz_payment_detail paymentcustomer ON paymentcustomer.relative_no=a.order_no AND paymentcustomer.payment_type=2 and paymentcustomer.status='00' LEFT JOIN car_biz_payment_detail paymentdriver ON paymentdriver.relative_no=a.order_no AND paymentdriver.payment_type=4 LEFT JOIN car_biz_order_settle_detail det on a.order_id=det.order_id LEFT JOIN car_biz_order_settle_detail_extension de on det.order_no=de.order_no where a.order_id = #{orderId , jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT detail.coupon_amount AS couponAmount, detail.coupon_settle_amount AS couponSettleAmount, detail.customer_creditcard_amount AS customerCreditcardAmount, detail.gift_settle_amount AS giftSettleAmount, detail.charge_settle_amount AS chargeSettleAmount, detail.deiver_creditcard_amount AS driverCreditcardAmount, detail.order_original_amount AS orderAmount, detail.deiver_cash_amount AS driverCashAmount, detail.driver_actual_pay AS driverActualPay, detail.driver_pay AS driverPay, detail.pos_pay AS posPay FROM car_biz_order_settle_detail detail WHERE detail.order_id=#{orderId}

SELECT group_id as groupId, car_biz_car_group.create_date as createDate, car_biz_car_group.update_date as updateDate, group_name as groupName, seat_num as seatNum, chartered_status as charteredStatus, rank, car_biz_car_group.sort, car_biz_car_group.status, car_biz_car_group.create_by as createBy, car_biz_car_group.update_by as updateBy, car_biz_car_group.memo as memo, u1.name as createName, u2.name as updateName FROM car_biz_car_group LEFT JOIN car_sys_user u1 ON car_biz_car_group.create_by=u1.user_id LEFT JOIN car_sys_user u2 ON car_biz_car_group.update_by=u2.user_id where group_id=#{id}

SELECT b.cost, c.cost_type_name costTypeName from car_fact_order a JOIN car_biz_other_service_cost b on a.order_id=b.order_id JOIN car_biz_cost_type c on b.cost_type_id=c.cost_type_id where a.order_id = #{orderId , jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT c.plan_id AS planId, c.version as planVer, c.price_id as priceId, c.service_id as serviceId, c.mileage_price as mileagePrice, c.minute_price as minutePrice, c.over_time_price as overTimePrice, c.over_mileage_price as overMileagePrice, c.base_price as basePrice, c.peak_price as peakPrice, c.peak_price_time as peakPriceTime, c.include_long_distance as includeLongDistance, c.include_mileage as includeMileage, c.include_minute as includeMinute, c.long_distance_price as longDistancePriceRate, c.night_service_price as nightServicePrice, c.night_service_price_time as nightServicePriceTime FROM car_biz_pricing_snapshoot c WHERE c.order_no = #{orderNo} AND c.`status` = 1

SELECT order_no as orderNo , DATE_FORMAT(start_waiting_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS startWaitingTime, DATE_FORMAT(end_waiting_time, '%Y-%m-%d %T') AS endWaitingTime FROM car_biz_order_waiting_period where order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.sql: main_order_id, main_order_no, service_type_id, city_id, status, order_total_num, finish_order_num, first_order_id, last_order_id, driver_start_long_addr, driver_start_short_addr, driver_start_point, driver_start_date, driver_end_long_addr, driver_end_short_addr, driver_end_point, driver_end_date, driver_id, group_id, license_plates, driver_total_mileage, driver_total_time, driver_total_fee, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by
mapper.select:
select
,DATE_FORMAT(driver_start_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') driverStartDateStr ,DATE_FORMAT(driver_end_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') driverEndDateStr ,DATE_FORMAT(create_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') createDateStr ,DATE_FORMAT(update_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') updateDateStr from carpool_main_order where main_order_no = #{mainOrderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT service_id as serviceId, service.service_name as serviceName, service.service_no as serviceNo, service.sort as sort, service.update_date as updateDate, service.create_date as createDate, service.status as status, service.memo as memo FROM car_biz_service service WHERE service_id = #{serviceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
SELECT model.model_name AS modeName FROM car_biz_car_info car LEFT JOIN car_biz_model model ON model.model_id = car.car_model_id WHERE car.license_plates = #{licensePlates}
